description: A painting titled Erasistratus Discovering the Cause of Antiochus' Disease was made by Jacques-Louis David in 1774. It's a neoclassicism painting made using oil paint on canvas measuring 120cm x 155cm. The main subject of the painting is disease and the characters depicted are Erasistratus, Seleucus I Nicator, Antiochus I Soter. The genres that describe this work best are history painting.
